10 %.from sentence: We use 10 % of the training set as a held - out validation set for hyperparameter tuning .

initial learning Utterances.from sentence: To optimize the parameters , we use Stochastic Gradient Descent ( SGD ) optimizer , starting with an initial learning Utterances whose history has atleast 3 similar emotion labels in either own history or the history of the other person , is counted in case 1 or 2 , respectively .

annealing approach.from sentence: An annealing approach halves the lr every 20 epochs and termination is decided using an early - stop measure with a patience of 12 by monitoring the validation loss .

Gradient clipping.from sentence: Gradient clipping is used for regularization with a norm set to 40 .

dimension size.from sentence: The dimension size of the memory cells d is set as 50 .

decided using.from sentence: Hyperparameters are decided using a Random Search .

validation performance.from sentence: Based on validation performance , context window length K is set to be 40 and the number of hops R is fixed at 3 hops .
